document_data.name: ''Joril's Axe''
document_data.location: [[Dorn's Deep|Wyrm's Tooth glacier]], [[Spine of the World]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Joril's axe''''' was a huge two-handed [[battleaxe]] that belonged to [[Joril Frostbeard]] of the [[Dorn's Deep|Wyrm's Tooth Glacier]] on the [[Spine of the World]].
document_data.Description: ''Joril's axe'' was a giant weapon with a thick {{SI|6'|'"|long=yes}} haft topped with a double-bitted axe blade. Created to be used by [[frost giant]]s, ''Joril's axe'' was unwieldy. However, a skilled warrior could handle using this axe in battle, dealing devastating damage to their opponents.
document_data.Powers: ''Joril's axe'' was enchanted with several types of magics. In addition, it possessed a ''+3'' enchantment and increased the user's constitution in exchange for dexterity reduction.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1281 DR]], ''Joril's axe'' belonged to Joril Frostbeard, a mighty frost giant leader, who lived with his clan in a cavern within the Wyrm's Tooth glacier atop the Spine of the World.
